Articles.Content: Assuming I use Chrome OS optionally? Cheater! My school issued Chromebooks for student, I have no choice!
Issued a computer for schoolwork? Fine if you want to cheat your way to better education. My schooling was almost all pencil and paper. /OldDude

Using pecnils and paper???!!!!!!!! You are a gigantic chhhhhhhhhhhhhhheeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeaaaaaaaaaaaatrttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttttteeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeerrrrrrrrrrrrrrrrr!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! Nyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyannyan

Not a wall of textnyancheater

You CHEATER! Your overly large signature GIF makes the page load too slowly, making it hard for users with slower internet connections to post replies, thus increasing the likelihood that you post ahead of them...

You CHEATER! Your overly large signature GIF makes the page load too slowly, making it hard for users with slower internet connections to post replies, thus increasing the likelihood that you post ahead of them...

Message too long. You have been designated as a CHEATER! Prepare to be thrown out of the airlock.
Airlock justice Is clearly the last resort of the most blatant CHEATERS. ..
No signature? Cheating. Good people have a mud signature!
Having a profile which has multiple references to the video linked in your signature, obviously someone must be cheating here!
Lack of avatar and usage of colorful signature? Ye be a cheetaaaaarrr! Only nay-cheetaaaaarrrs be havin' a regulaarrr avatar and signatargh!
Waggin' yer tongue like a pirate? Ahoy mateys, thar be cheatin' about! Shipshape posters ne'er be singin' sea chanties.
Dingy off ther port bow! Dingy off ther port bow! Dingy full to ther 'rim with cheating! Yer not welcome 'board this ship of non-cheating!

Hello. I see you did not abide by the rules. CHEATER! Real players always read the rules in-full before posting!

Encoding your accusation in binary ascii? That's the encryption for cheaters! Real crypto types use SHA-256 or better.
Posting an encrypted message no one can read isn't just cheating, it's game-breaking cheating.
its just binary. not putting it to a coder is cheating. unless you openly declare you don't know one. like I just did
Ninjaing me? CHEATER! Real players are always a brony, so that i can rip on them!
Cheater saying that all players are bronys

Back to your first post in binary. I made this game. And I followed the rules. I called him a cheater and showed that my boat was the non-cheating way to do it.

Falsely accusing the game maker of cheating? Cheating. Heresy even. No good, non-cheaters do that.
Claiming you can never cheat because you invented the game? That's a high horse you're on there, cheater. Come down and play with us non-cheaters.
chaetibng for making no sense
Cheating for claiming a perfectly sensible post makes no sense and having a spelling error to boot. That's like, TWO forms of cheating right there you Cheater...
